sentences.en: Business is a competitive activity. It is very fierce and very unforgiving.
sentences.cn: 商场如战场，竞争激烈，不近人情。

sentences.en: Consensual sexual contact between two males can be a criminal activity.
sentences.cn: 两名男性之间发生的双方自愿的性接触可能会构成犯罪。

sentences.en: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.cn: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.en: In half an hour's whirl of activity she does it all.
sentences.cn: 经过半个小时的忙碌，她全都做完了。

sentences.en: On Saturday morning, the town hums with activity and life.
sentences.cn: 周六早晨，小镇一派热闹繁忙，活力盎然。

sentences.en: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.cn: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

sentences.en: Some drugs can cause the inhibition of normal bodily activity.
sentences.cn: 有些药剂会对正常的身体功能产生抑制作用.

sentences.en: The construction site was a hive of activity.
sentences.cn: 建筑工地上一片繁忙景象.

sentences.en: The house has been full of activity all day.
The manager's arrival galvanised the workers into activity.
sentences.cn: 经理一来,工人闻风而动.

sentences.en: The military on both sides are involved in intense activity.
sentences.cn: 双方的武装力量都有密集动作。

sentences.en: The rehearsal studio is buzzing with lunchtime activity.
sentences.cn: 大家在吃午饭，排练室里很是嘈杂。

sentences.en: The streets were noisy and full of activity.
sentences.cn: 街上熙熙攘攘，车水马龙。

sentences.en: The whole place was a scene of feverish activity .
sentences.cn: 整个地方都是一片紧张匆忙的景象。

sentences.en: There was a fury of activity on the morning of their departure.
sentences.cn: 他们离开的那个早上,群情激昂.

sentences.en: This sort of activity damages the reputation of the collective.
sentences.cn: 这种行为有损于集体的荣誉.

sentences.en: We must expose this shameful activity to the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要向报社揭露这一无耻行径.

words.tran_cn: 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的
行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势
行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节
催化剂；[助剂] 活化剂；[助剂] 激活剂；触媒剂
主观能动性；活动积极性
使激活；使活动起来；有生气（activate的过去分词）
行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效
刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性

phrases.tran_cn: 抗菌活性；抗菌能力；抗微生物活性
商业活动，经济活动；业务活动
身体活动，体育活动；体力活动

trans.tran_en: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim
